attributes.action: Make the Red Fox national animal of England instead of a non native Lion.
attributes.background:
Currently the national animal of England is a Lion which is a non native species. It would be a lot more fitting to have an animal native to our shores as a national animal.
The Red Fox is the perfect animal I think to represent our country and English ways.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the association of the lion with England is a matter of tradition and not something with a formal status that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.
